summary: expanded player customization/hd textures of the RS children mod by Ranaline
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#cfe2f3]-
[size=4]disclaimer
[/size]-
this is not my work. this is just an assortment of mods made by other people. i will delete this if any authors that helped to make this possible object to this mod being here (this is the only place that it's going to be uploaded with these resources, it's going to stay that way).
-
[size=4]info
[/size]-
this is a replacer of a child replacer, it requires rs children right now. i was working on a completely separate replacement for kids, but it was hard to do (i'm not the most experienced in the ck) so i decided to use the open resource [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555]RS Children[/url] by ranaline as a base! first of all, this adds 22 new [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]hairs[/url] to the game (mainly female hairs, sorry). this changes the eyes, replacing them with higher quality ones from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]Witcher 3 Eyes [/url]by Oaristys. changes brows to an amazing high resolution set of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by Hvelgmir[/url] that will probably kill your frame rate. this also updates the head texture. the head texture is not required, and you'll probably delete it. basically it adds more shine to the lips and makes the eyelash shadows a little longer. as of now, you probably shouldn't use the head texture if you don't like neck seams and can live with slightly less glossy lips and slightly less longer eyelash shadows. finally, it changes Braith's hair to a cute, long hairstyle so she's not as similar to Adara. regarding the comments section, please keep everything pg i guess and 
-
[size=4]requirements
[/size]-
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555]RS Children Overhaul - playable all dlc version[/url] + all Bethesda dlcs
-
[size=4]installation[/size]
-
the way i uploaded this mod correlates to the way i wish things were uploaded. if you're like me, you have horrible internet. so, i uploaded things separately. the main module, read me, and presets are separated. i don't usually read the read mes anyway, so that extra few kb's is a waste. the readme states how to manually install, and pick and choose what parts of this mod you'd like. the mod description included in that is a few hours old, i changed the description since then, and i don't feel like updating it oops
-
[size=4]future plans
[/size]-
i'd like to add different weights to the bodies, with a skinny _0 and a chubby _1 .nif because sometimes i want to roleplay as a beggar, or an overweight noble child. (that sounds kinda odd??) also, new nevernude skin textures in 2k and 4k!!!!!!
-
[size=4]credits[/size]
[size=3][i]please notify me if i missed anything. thank you!
[/i][/size]-
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555]RS Children Overhaul[/url] by Ranaline
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by Hverglmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url] by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79735/?]Sand and Wind KS Hairdos Retexture[/url] by Jasper
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]Witcher 3 Eyes[/url] by Oaristys
triptherift, Ranaline, tktk1, and Bagserk for inspiration.
-
[size=4]screenshots[/size]
[size=2]-[/size]
please upload your SFW screenshots. no matter the quality, your SFW image would help add to the gallery. somehow even i was able to take those screenshots with an Intel HD Graphics 2000 gpu...
...
mods in screenshots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83091/?]Antique Dragon ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?]iNeed[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
and finally, the character is used the exact same mods in the credits.
-[/color][/center][center][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]tools used
[/size][/color][/center][center][color=#cfe2f3]-
paint.net - head texture, comparing brows and eyes for the most similar replacements.
nifskope - source of my depression. oh, also rerooting texture paths for the new hair.
creation kit - adding hairs, changing preset faces for each race and gender.
tes5edit - cleaning out the mod, making sure i didn't mess anything up, deleting errors.
-[/color][/center]
author: Ranaline and annanana
